import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update Avatar"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/users/me/avatar"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the avatar of the currently authenticated user.

You can find more information about profile management [here](../../docs/guides/principals/profile-management).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token) is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"file":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}},"required":["file"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
